scripts.build: bun run metafor:build && bun run actor:build && bun run web:build && bun run server:build && bun run actor:typegen  && bun run metafor:typegen
scripts.rebuild: bun run metafor:build && bun run web:build && bun run server:build && bun run actor:build
scripts.metafor:build: cd ../zavx0z/metafor && bun run build:metafor && cp dist/metafor.js ../../webxr-space/everywhere-everything/metafor.js
scripts.metafor:typegen: cd ../zavx0z/metafor && bun run typegen:metafor && cp dist/metafor.d.ts ../../webxr-space/everywhere-everything/metafor.d.ts
scripts.actor:build: cd ../zavx0z/metafor && bun run build:actor && cp dist/actor.js ../../webxr-space/everywhere-everything/actor.js
scripts.actor:typegen: cd ../zavx0z/metafor && bun run typegen:actor && cp dist/actor.js ../../webxr-space/everywhere-everything/actor.d.ts
scripts.web:build: cd ../zavx0z/metafor && bun run build:web && cp -r dist/web ../../webxr-space/everywhere-everything
scripts.server:build: cd ../zavx0z/metafor && bun run build:server && cp -r dist/server ../../webxr-space/everywhere-everything
